results.content:
Overall it was a good course to understand how to create a HTML based email.
Since at the beging of the course it was said that you do not need to know HTML, a little bit of explanation of the HTML tags used would go a long way. Also an explanation of why everything cannot be in one big table and each of the sections in a row &cell would be helpful.
A little bit of explanation of CSS styling, just enough to create good looking emails would  make this course more comprehensive.
results.content_html:
Overall it was a good course to understand how to create a HTML based email.
Since at the beging of the course it was said that you do not need to know HTML, a little bit of explanation of the HTML tags used would go a long way. Also an explanation of why everything cannot be in one big table and each of the sections in a row &cell would be helpful.
A little bit of explanation of CSS styling, just enough to create good looking emails would make this course more comprehensive.

results.content: I was surprised at how little I knew about HTML emails. But this course was complete in explaining the process and the information about using gmail with these html emails was great. The course was a little slow in the pace but easy to follow and put into practice all the techniques Maxim talked about. The only thing that would make it better is making these with HTML5 or using divs.  I would definitely recommend this course.
results.content_html: I was surprised at how little I knew about HTML emails. But this course was complete in explaining the process and the information about using gmail with these html emails was great. The course was a little slow in the pace but easy to follow and put into practice all the techniques Maxim talked about. The only thing that would make it better is making these with HTML5 or using divs. I would definitely recommend this course.

results.content: Maxim did a great job breaking the whole HTML building process in small, easy to follow steps with detail explanation of every task. I strongly recommend this course!
results.content_html: Maxim did a great job breaking the whole HTML building process in small, easy to follow steps with detail explanation of every task. I strongly recommend this course!

results.content: Too long to just check the tools. Got better after, but I still had some trouble making the email with the resources, I had to fix the images size for it to work
results.content_html: Too long to just check the tools. Got better after, but I still had some trouble making the email with the resources, I had to fix the images size for it to work

results.content:
Some experience of HTML is needed as commands used are not explained. Would also have liked the CTA to have linked to an external web address rather than a JPEG to create a more 'real life' experience. 

However, the course was brilliant for understanding how to construct and code an email!
results.content_html:
Some experience of HTML is needed as commands used are not explained. Would also have liked the CTA to have linked to an external web address rather than a JPEG to create a more 'real life' experience.

However, the course was brilliant for understanding how to construct and code an email!

results.content: I feel the instructor was boring and it was hard not to fall asleep. The best part was learning how to make an automated gif. He should have given basic instruction for beginners

results.content: I don't know html. I am copying what he is doing in html, however I don't understand why I am doing what I am doing. It would be beneficial if he explained reasoning behind why we are typing what in html. Or, if HTML was a required skill for this course, it would have been nice to have that prominently called out before buying.
